name: Penguin Runner Mobile Game (Android)
description:
Penguin Runner is a 3D endless runner mobile game, created with Epitome Game's free course on Youtube: Create a COMPLETE android & iOS game - FULL COURSE [Unity C#] - YouTube

Additional Assets

HyperCasual Music Pack (Demo) | Audio Music | Unity Asset Store
